text: James, Peter mo John ala e hai be nia dagi ni digaula, la gu modongoohia bolo God gu dugu mai dogu duhongo hegau deenei. Digaula guu lulu mau lima mo Barnabas belee haga modongoohia bolo gimaadou huogodoo guu buni ngaadahi. Gimaadou guu baba bolo gimaua mo Barnabas e ngalua i baahi digau tuadimee, gei digaula ga ngalua i baahi digau o Jew.
